description.value:
Activate 1 Interact

Cayden's brew is like rich beer or ale, with a golden-brown color and foamy head. For 1 hour after you drink it, you have a +1 item bonus to saving throws against fear effects. Also, you can use a single action to breathe out a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] of intoxicating vapor with a burp that can be heard for 100 feet. Any creature in the vapor must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40] saving throw. After you use this breath weapon, you can't do so again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is clumsy 1 and stupefied 1 for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}. The clumsy and stupefied conditions last until [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} after the sickened condition ends.
